definition: partial to (some kinds of food, usu. unhealthy)/having likes and dislikes/partial eclipse
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: This eclipse will work to your favor.
sentences.chinese: 这次月偏食将您的青睐。

sentences.english: These locations can see the complete eclipse from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 这些地点可以看到完整的偏食从开始到结束。

sentences.english: The limits of the Moon's penumbral shadow define the region of visibility of the partial eclipse.
sentences.chinese: 半影区的界限详细定义了日偏食的可视区域。

sentences.english: It also helps you avoid cravings and overindulging .
sentences.chinese: 它也帮助你避免偏食和放纵开怀。

sentences.english: When the moon takes a bite-size chunk out of the sun, it's a partial solar eclipse.
sentences.chinese: 如果月球挡住太阳的一小部分，会产生日偏食。

sentences.english: Some patient excessively on diet or partial eclipse.
sentences.chinese: 有的患者过度限制饮食或偏食。

sentences.english: However, almost all of Asia will be in a position to watch a partial eclipse of the sun .
sentences.chinese: 不过，几乎在亚洲的各个地方都能看到日偏食。

sentences.english: Changes in food preferences take time to happen.
sentences.chinese: 偏食的改变需要时间来发生。

sentences.english: Malnutrition caused mainly because junk food.
sentences.chinese: 营养不良主要是因为偏食造成的。

sentences.english: During a partial solar eclipse, only part of the sun is blotted out. (36 images)
sentences.chinese: 日偏食则意味着只有部分日面被遮住。

sentences.english: A partial eclipse will be visible as far south as northern Australia and as far north as Siberia, he said.
sentences.chinese: 南至北部澳大利亚，北至斯伯利亚都能观察到日偏食。

sentences.english: They begin to dietary bias, which makes the nutrition in their body in out-off-balance.
sentences.chinese: 他们就开始偏食，这样的话会让他们营养不良。

sentences.english: The further east the event tracked, the closer it got to local sunset.
sentences.chinese: 越往东，日偏食发生的时间越接近日落。

sentences.english: This eclipse is about to fall on the solstice, which gives it much more influence.
sentences.chinese: 这次月偏食即将落在冬至，这使得它的影响更大。

sentences.english: The Tuesday eclipse was the first of four partial solar eclipses in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 本周二的日食是2011年四次日偏食中的第一场。

sentences.english: Eat a wide variety to improve health and well-being.
sentences.chinese: 不吃偏食可以改善健康和福祉。

definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
